name: places/ChIJVXbUeqFZwokRrwjFawgpQTs
formattedAddress: 210 5th Ave Suite 602, New York, NY 10010, USA
adrFormatAddress: 210 5th Ave Suite 602, New York, NY 10010, USA

editorialSummary.text: Flagship store for a brand of sophisticated women's officewear tailored from imported fabrics.

originalText.text:
I don't enjoy writing negative reviews, but I am really disappointed in the quality of the dress that I purchased (the Riverside). I made this purchase about 6 months ago and originally liked it, but ultimately the quality was about what you would expect from Forever 21 or a fast fashion brand. The dress arrived with a couple of small snags, but after 6 months, there was piling all over the back of the dress and the zipper broke. It's a bummer because the dress was quite comfortable, but not worth the amount I paid for it. Additionally, I followed the size guide but I had to exchange for a smaller size because the arm holes were too big and showed half of my bra.

Maybe other items from this brand are higher quality, but I am really hesitant to try again. I have had better luck with Old Navy & Banana Republic Factory.

originalText.text: My husband loves my Of Mercer dresses. I wear them to business presentations, interviews, and client meetings. I also receive a lot of compliments when I'm at work because of the excellent fit and stylish designs. They're worth every penny. Some of the fabrics have different levels of stretch than others. I own a size 4 in one and a size 10 in another. I really like the company's story. Do good by supporting these great fashions. As a bonus, you're directly helping American workers. They're made in New York!

I own a size 4 in one and a size 10 in another. I really like the company's story. Do good by supporting these great fashions. As a bonus, you're directly helping American workers. They're made in New York!

originalText.text:
I love every item I've purchased from Of Mercer ranging from dresses to blazers to tops. The fabrics and materials seem to be chosen with great care and consideration for the end user. Items are comfortable and durable yet very stylish (i.e. the Wrap dress made from bamboo jersey is insanely perfect). They do it all!

Including fostering a great community through their incredible events. I met the author of my favorite book, 'Cork Dork' at a wine tasting / book reading they hosted. Hands down the best office wear company that also can transition seamlessly if you need to attend a dinner or party after work. The Stanton is my favorite!

originalText.text: I had an appointment at their new office/clothing showroom and it was lovely! They offered me drinks and had pulled a ton of things in my size--it was really useful to try things on in person and figure out exactly which size looked best. Because some of their dresses are stretchy, it did vary, but I have that with every clothing brand. I would definitely go back to the store and order more of their clothes, and I recommend anyone in NYC check out their little appointment-only shop!

originalText.text: I am a huge fan of Of Mercer! Their cuts are flattering, comfortable, chic, and functional. My Of Mercer pieces help me keep my femininity in the workplace while also looking like a polished professional. Of Mercer is the perfect desk-to-drinks solution, and I always feel comfortable scooting from work directly to meet friends or my boyfriend without worrying about stopping to change. And to add a cherry on top, Of Mercer is a huge supporter of professional women and encourages a strong community of respect and opportunity within their brand. Definitely worth a visit to their store, whether you are a local New Yorker or passing through Manhattan!
